    • position

      MapDecoration.Builder position(Vector2i position) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the position of the decoration. Valid co-ordinates are between -128 and 127, with (-128, -128) being the bottom left corner of a map.
      Returns:
      This builder, for chaining
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a position outside of the map is specified.
      See Also:
      • for further descrption of the co-ordinate system

    • customName

      MapDecoration.Builder customName(Component customName)

    • from

    • fromContainer

      MapDecoration.Builder fromContainer(DataView container)
      Attempts to reconstruct the builder with all of the data from DataSerializable.toContainer().

      If the given DataView was from a persistent MapDecoration, i.e, MapDecoration.isPersistent() returned true, it will create a custom MapDecoration that mimics it, which will be persistent

      Parameters:
      container - The container to translate
      Returns:
      This builder, for chaining

    • build

      MapDecoration build() throws IllegalStateException
      Creates a new MapDecoration based on the current builder state.
      Returns:
      A MapDecoration
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if a MapDecorationType has not been supplied
